Package org.graffiti.plugin

Class XMLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graffiti.plugin.XMLHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HelperClass
    public class XMLHelper
extends Object
implements HelperClass
    Contains some (static) auxiliary methods for writing XML.
